*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Samuel M. Williams, Monclova, January 9, 1831. Political news, instructions about locating land for Mexican officials.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Monclova */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="01-09-1831">Jany 9 1831*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr Sir.*/p*
*p*I arrived here *date_mentioned n="01-08-1831">yesterday */date_mentioned*sin novedad, and shall leave in the *date_mentioned n="01-10-1831">morning*/date_mentioned*. *person_mentioned*Dn Victor Blanco*/person_mentioned* recd me in his *location_mentioned*home */location_mentioned*with great friendship and attention—he has truly an amiable and interesting *person_mentioned*family*/person_mentioned*. I wrote you by *person_mentioned*Madero */person_mentioned*that *person_mentioned*Dn Victor*/person_mentioned* would appoint you his *person_mentioned*agent */person_mentioned*to select his *location_mentioned*land*/location_mentioned*—by this mail he will send you a power of attorney to act as his *person_mentioned*agent*/person_mentioned*, and also as the *person_mentioned*agent */person_mentioned*of many *person_mentioned*others*/person_mentioned*. I most particularly request that you will try and make good selections for *person_mentioned*Dn Victor*/person_mentioned*, lie wants the most of his *location_mentioned*land on the Trinity*/location_mentioned* low down or on *location_mentioned*San Jacinto*/location_mentioned*. This *person_mentioned*gentleman */person_mentioned*is a very warm and sincere *person_mentioned*friend */person_mentioned*and I hope you will spare no pains to get good selections for him*/p*
*p*The accounts given to me here by *person_mentioned*Dn Victor*/person_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*Tijerina */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*others*/person_mentioned*, as to the general aspect of political affairs, amount in substance to this—-that the present *person_mentioned*administration */person_mentioned*have all the effective portion of the *person_mentioned*Army */person_mentioned*and all the *person_mentioned*Legislatures */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Governors */person_mentioned*of all the *location_mentioned*States*/location_mentioned* in their favor, and most of the Talents and wealth of the nation. They are of opinion that the present *person_mentioned*Govt*/person_mentioned*, will sustain itself and that *person_mentioned*Guerrero */person_mentioned*must soon be put down entirely. *person_mentioned*Dn Victor*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*others*/person_mentioned* here, think that this *person_mentioned*administration */person_mentioned*is not hostile to *location_mentioned*North American*/location_mentioned* emigration to *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*, and that the present restrictions will be removed before this year concludes. They all say that my *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned* stands very high with the Govt, both in *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*and in *location_mentioned*Saltillo*/location_mentioned*. The answer of our *person_mentioned*Ayto */person_mentioned*to that of *location_mentioned*Leona Vicario*/location_mentioned* has given general satisfaction to all intelligent and reflecting men and has raised our character more than you have any idea of. The *person_mentioned*Senate */person_mentioned*has approved of *person_mentioned*Carrillo*/person_mentioned*'s credentials as Senator, unanimously , not one vote in favor of the Jalapising System proposed by the *person_mentioned*Saltilleros*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*In *location_mentioned*Rio Grande*/location_mentioned* and in this *location_mentioned*place */location_mentioned*(the only *location_mentioned*towns */location_mentioned*I have passed through) I have been treated with more attention and respect than I had any reason to expect. The opinion here is that *person_mentioned*Teran */person_mentioned*will not go to *location_mentioned*Mexico*/location_mentioned*, he that he will proceed to *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*in a short time. The *person_mentioned*enemies */person_mentioned*to *location_mentioned*North American*/location_mentioned* emigration are beginning to suspect that he is more friendly to them than they wish etc. etc. I give these ideas as I have recd them. You see that they differ very much from those intertained in *location_mentioned*Bexar*/location_mentioned*. When I get to *location_mentioned*headquarters */location_mentioned*I shall be able to form some certain opinion on these subjects, in the meantime it is best to pursue a prudent and silent course as to all matters of politics.*/p*
*p*The *location_mentioned*town at the crossing of the upper road on the Colorado*/location_mentioned* is yet to name. I wish you would request *person_mentioned*Arciniega */person_mentioned*not to name it until he hears from me on the subject.*/p*
*p*My *person_mentioned*colleague Padre Murquis*/person_mentioned* passed here on the *date_mentioned n="01-08-1831">8d of this month*/date_mentioned*, I am told he intends to ask leave to resign, but *person_mentioned*Dn Victor*/person_mentioned* thinks that it was under a belief that I would not come on.*/p*
*p*Try and get the*location_mentioned* coast colony*/location_mentioned* out of the way, before *person_mentioned*Arciniega */person_mentioned*gets there so that you may have nothing to interfere with the other business.*/p*
*p*The *location_mentioned*mountains round this place*/location_mentioned* are white with snow and ice and the weather very cold and wet—my health is good. The horses stand the journey very well—corn in this place is only 75 cents to a dollar the fanega I again recommend *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Dn Victor*/person_mentioned*'s land*/location_mentioned* matter to you particularly—that is, his own claims the others are for his *person_mentioned*friends */person_mentioned*and are of secondary consideration in comparison with his, for they want the *location_mentioned*land */location_mentioned*for speculation—he wants it for his *person_mentioned*family*/person_mentioned*, he has ten *person_mentioned*children*/person_mentioned*, and a more promising *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*I have never seen, remember me to*person_mentioned* Mrs. Sweet*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Sarah*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S F Austin */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*/div1*
